text: Sammuel Lamur (born June 8, 1989) is an American football quarterback who is currently a free agent. He was signed by the Tampa Bay Storm as an undrafted free agent in 2014 as a quarterback. He played college football at Kansas State University. He is the twin brother of Minnesota Vikings linebacker, Emmanuel Lamur. He was signed by the Tampa Bay Buccaneers to play linebacker on August 6, 2015. He was waived on August 11, 2015. ==Personal life== Lamur is of Haitian descent. He is the twin brother of current New York Jets linebacker Emmanuel Lamur. ==References== ==External links== *Tampa Bay Buccaneers bio *Kansas State bio *Arena Football League bio Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:American football quarterbacks Category:American football linebackers Category:Kansas State Wildcats football players Category:Tampa Bay Storm players Category:Independence Pirates football players Category:Tampa Bay Buccaneers players
title: Sammuel Lamur
